name: Movement Test (Lost Studios)
description:
This is just a movement test for our future games. We would Love your opinion on it.

Credits:

Coding: Lost_in_Ideas and Dinja265

Music: Lost Angle

Controls: 

Move: WASD/Arrow Keys

Jump: Space Key (only for bigger bean)

Switch Characters: C key

Move Camera Around Player: Middle Mouse

Rotation: Mouse movement

Known glitches:

Middle mouse button does not do anything when held down (Fixed)
